Subject: RE: Request for Insurance - Furniture Unpacking & Setup at New Palm Villa -SUPER URGENT
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Hagop, 

 

I hope you are doing well

 

Please arrange now insurance coverage for the 16 shipments, from the time they leave DIP or the forwarder, through to delivery at the IPC villa. Please also ensure that the furniture—some of which has already arrived at the villa—is covered for a period of 1 year. Can you please confirm it today

 

As the building is still under the Khansaheb building certificate, we will secure insurance for the building and its contents once we receive the building permit. In the meantime, we require insurance for all goods in transit from DIP or the forwarder to the villa, as well as coverage for the items at the villa until the comprehensive building insurance is in place

 

Thank you and best regards,

 

Patrick Chalhoub

 

 

PATRICK CHALHOUB

Hi Diana,

 

Thank you for your below e-mail.

 

As an additional note, the movement we have already insured. E-movers will not be moving this specific shipment. They will just unpack and assemble upon delivery of the shipment of the Paola Lenti items.

 

We are just requesting insurance for damages during unpacking, assembly and setup as E-movers have a limit of liability of USD 500 only. Above this threshold, the do not take any responsibility.

 

The average value of the items is EUR 1,600 and the highest value items is ~EUR 20,000.

 

Appreciate your kind support on the matter and look forward to hearing from you.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

Dear Hagop,

 

Thanks for your email.


We have reviewed the below case and would like to advice you that, policy for such installation/assembly/setup works should be covered under the E-movers liability policy as they are the party involved in the transit as well as

assembly.

 

Unfortunately, we don’t have any policies to cover either E-movers nor the Principal party.

 

Appreciate your kind understanding.

 

 

Best Regards,

com <mailto:hiba.assaf@etoilegroup.com> >; Geeta Manjal <Geeta.Manjal@chalhoub.com <mailto:Geeta.Manjal@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: Request for Insurance - Furniture Unpacking & Setup at New Palm Villa

 

Hi Rayan,

 

Hope all is well.

 

As per our discussion, please kindly arrange insurance coverage for the unpacking, assembly, and setup of high-value furniture at the new Chalhoub Family Residence (Villa) on Palm Jumeirah.

 

The full list of items and a summary from the commercial invoices are attached for your convenience. The unpacking and assembly will be carried out by E-Movers.

 

The total value of Items is €325,677.50. (Highest Value Item: €20,277.75 (Parallelo Rug); Average Value per Item: Approx. €1,661.62)

 

The assembly work is scheduled to begin tomorrow. As such, we require the insurance to be active from Saturday, June 14, 2025, to Monday, June 16, 2025.

 

We would appreciate it if the insurance deductible could be set at no more than USD 1,000, preferably USD 500. Given the nature of the work, any potential damages will likely be limited to individual pieces only.

 

Finally, please advise if there is a specific protocol we should instruct the E-Movers team to follow for documenting any losses.

 

Please also note that this is the first of several assembly projects. We would be grateful if you could provide a set rate that can be applied to future requirements for similar categories of items.

 

Appreciate your support on the matter.

 

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop

HAGOP GHAZARIAN

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

com <mailto:hiba.assaf@etoilegroup.com> >; Geeta Manjal <Geeta.Manjal@chalhoub.com <mailto:Geeta.Manjal@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: Request for Insurance - Furniture Unpacking & Setup at New Palm Villa

 

Hi Rayan,

 

Hope all is well.

 

As per our discussion, please kindly arrange insurance coverage for the unpacking, assembly, and setup of high-value furniture at the new Chalhoub Family Residence (Villa) on Palm Jumeirah.

 

The full list of items and a summary from the commercial invoices are attached for your convenience. The unpacking and assembly will be carried out by E-Movers.

 

The total value of Items is €325,677.50. (Highest Value Item: €20,277.75 (Parallelo Rug); Average Value per Item: Approx. €1,661.62)

 

The assembly work is scheduled to begin tomorrow. As such, we require the insurance to be active from Saturday, June 14, 2025, to Monday, June 16, 2025.

 

We would appreciate it if the insurance deductible could be set at no more than USD 1,000, preferably USD 500. Given the nature of the work, any potential damages will likely be limited to individual pieces only.

 

Finally, please advise if there is a specific protocol we should instruct the E-Movers team to follow for documenting any losses.

 

Please also note that this is the first of several assembly projects. We would be grateful if you could provide a set rate that can be applied to future requirements for similar categories of items.

 

Appreciate your support on the matter.

 

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop

HAGOP GHAZARIAN

Dear Patrick,
Thank you for your instructions.
I will proceed immediately with arranging the transit insurance to cover the movement of the furniture from DIP to the villa for all shipments.
Will also arrange cover for damages due to unpacking, assembly, and setup process.
However, regarding the one-year coverage for the contents at the villa, we can secure a valid cover only if DEWA is connected and fire protection system is connected and operational.
I can process the insurance for the villa and the related contents and the cover will automatically become valid once the mentioned subjectivities are satisfied.
Best Regards,

Patrick Chalhoub

com <mailto:hiba.assaf@etoilegroup.com> >; Geeta Manjal <Geeta.Manjal@chalhoub.com <mailto:Geeta.Manjal@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: Request for Insurance - Furniture Unpacking & Setup at New Palm Villa

 

Hi Rayan,

 

Hope all is well.

 

As per our discussion, please kindly arrange insurance coverage for the unpacking, assembly, and setup of high-value furniture at the new Chalhoub Family Residence (Villa) on Palm Jumeirah.

 

The full list of items and a summary from the commercial invoices are attached for your convenience. The unpacking and assembly will be carried out by E-Movers.

 

The total value of Items is €325,677.50. (Highest Value Item: €20,277.75 (Parallelo Rug); Average Value per Item: Approx. €1,661.62)

 

The assembly work is scheduled to begin tomorrow. As such, we require the insurance to be active from Saturday, June 14, 2025, to Monday, June 16, 2025.

 

We would appreciate it if the insurance deductible could be set at no more than USD 1,000, preferably USD 500. Given the nature of the work, any potential damages will likely be limited to individual pieces only.

 

Finally, please advise if there is a specific protocol we should instruct the E-Movers team to follow for documenting any losses.

 

Please also note that this is the first of several assembly projects. We would be grateful if you could provide a set rate that can be applied to future requirements for similar categories of items.

 

Appreciate your support on the matter.

 

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop

HAGOP GHAZARIAN

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI
